text: Samantha Elizabeth Giles (born 2 July 1971) is an English actress and author. She is best known for portraying the role of Bernice Blackstock in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (1998–2002, 2004, 2012–2019, 2021–2023). Giles also portrayed Sally Boothe in the ITV drama series Where the Heart Is (2003–2006), and Valerie Holden in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks (2008, 2010). ==Personal life== Giles lives in Liverpool, Merseyside.
